ModMetaData.name: Xenotype Randomizer
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a Randomize button to the Xenotype editor.
________________________________________________
<size=18px><color=#5aa9d6>Updates</color></size> 07/10/2025: Added options to allow/disallow any specific gene in mod settings 06/14/2025: Updated to 1.6 08/28/2024: Added options for allowing or disallowing nonviolent and/or inbred xenotypes 07/24/2024: Improved random variability, added support for upcoming mod Faction Xenotype Randomizer 03/21/2024: Updated to 1.5
